mean_en: a device that is made of a long piece of thick cloth stretched between two poles and that is used for carrying an injured or dead person
sentence: He couldn't walk, so we had to take him to the ambulance on a stretcher.
sentence_trans: 他不能行走，所以我们必须用担架把他抬到救护车上。
word_etyma: stretch拉伸 ＋ er名词后缀 → stretcher延伸器
